document.full_text: the sudanese government said wednesday that it would not recognize the soon-to-be independent nation of south sudan if the southern government tried to annex the contested territory of abyei.
document.title: northern sudanese warn south over contested area
lines_and_colors: the sudanese government said wednesday that it would not recognize the soon-to-be independent nation of south sudan if the southern government tried to annex the contested territory of abyei.
